content:
I am facing issues when I try to sign in to zulip desktop application using google. Google throws a message "This browser or app may not be secure"
I was able to sign in earlier. Anyone else facing this issue.?
I am using zulip version v2.3.82.

Yeah, this has been happening to me too for a couple of weeks on my Ubuntu machine, although it's working fine on my OSX laptop. I was just assuming it was something I caused, seems like maybe not... :)

Are you on Linux as well?
@Tim Abbott have there been other reports of these kinds of issues?
Here is the github case to follow :- https://github.com/zulip/zulip/issues/13613
